sentences.en: All this public outpouring is so undignified.
sentences.cn: 所有这些当众宣泄都是很失体面的。

sentences.en: And ever, after such an outpouring , oh, a relief have I witnessed in those sinful brethren!
sentences.cn: 何况, 我还亲眼看到,在作了这样一番倾诉之后, 那些负罪的兄弟们有多么轻松!

sentences.en: C . continued an outpouring of associations to her mother's hatred of her.
sentences.cn: 她不断倾泄对于母亲憎恨她的联想.

sentences.en: Let's review the steps again which head up to this outpouring of power.
sentences.cn: 让我们再次回顾前往这一能力的步骤.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, there was a massive outpouring of grief worldwide.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 世界各地的人们流露出巨大的悲痛.

sentences.en: Politicians added their voice to the outpouring.
sentences.cn: 政治家们也流露出他们的心声.

sentences.en: She attacked him with an outpouring of words.
Since then, there an outpouring of literatures researched on this field.
sentences.cn: 此后,沿着这一方向, 出现了大量的文献,将研究进一步推向深入.

sentences.en: The news of his death produced an instant outpouring of grief.
sentences.cn: 他逝世的消息立即造成了一股悲伤情绪的涌现。

sentences.en: The sunshine comes and goes , outpouring driblet and melodious love songs.
sentences.cn: 光线在转化中流露出点点滴滴曼妙地情歌.

sentences.en: We were awe - struck by this outpouring of love, inspiration, and energy.
sentences.cn: 那倾泻而至的爱心 、 鼓励和力量令人肃然起敬由衷赞叹.

sentences.en: Yet despite this unseemly outpouring, the biggest problem of all - mental health - remains tight shut.
sentences.cn: 不过,尽管有上述种种不得体的言谈, 但对于最重要的问题 —— 心理健康 —— 人们仍守口如瓶.
